verses.verse: Now after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> it came to pass, that the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> asked <WH7592> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Who shall go up <WH5927> <WH8799> for us against the Kanahanites <WH3669> first <WH8462>, to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against them?
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Y'hudah <WH3063> shall go up <WH5927> <WH8799>: behold, I have delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> the land <WH776> into his hand <WH3027>.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto SHim`on <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> with me into my lot <WH1486>, that we may fight <WH3898> <WH8735> against the Kanahanites <WH3669>; and I likewise will go <WH1980> <WH8804> with thee into thy lot <WH1486>. So SHim`on <WH8095> went <WH3212> <WH8799> with him.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> went up <WH5927> <WH8799>; and the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> the Kanahanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522> into their hand <WH3027>: and they slew <WH5221> <WH8686> of them in Bezek <WH966> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376>.

And they found <WH4672> <WH8799> Adonibezek <WH137> in Bezek <WH966>: and they fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against him, and they slew <WH5221> <WH8686> the Kanahanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522>.

But Adonibezek <WH137> fled <WH5127> <WH8799>; and they pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> after <WH310> him, and caught <WH270> <WH8799> him, and cut off <WH7112> <WH8762> his thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and his great toes <WH7272>.

And Adonibezek <WH137> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Threescore and ten <WH7657> kings <WH4428>, having their thumbs <WH931> <WH3027> and their great toes <WH7272> cut off <WH7112> <WH8794>, gathered <WH3950> <WH8764> their meat under my table <WH7979>: as I have done <WH6213> <WH8804>, so 'Elohim <WH430> hath requited <WH7999> <WH8765> me. And they brought <WH935> <WH8686> him to Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and there he died <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Now the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> had fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and had taken <WH3920> <WH8799> it, and smitten <WH5221> <WH8686> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and set <WH7971> <WH8765> the city <WH5892> on fire <WH784>.

And afterward <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> went down <WH3381> <WH8804> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against the Kanahanites <WH3669>, that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in the mountain <WH2022>, and in the south <WH5045>, and in the valley <WH8219>.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> went <WH3212> <WH8799> against the Kanahanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Hevron <WH2275>: (now the name <WH8034> of Hevron <WH2275> before <WH6440> was Kiryat-Arba <WH7153>:) and they slew <WH5221> <WH8686> Sheshai <WH8344>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and Talmai <WH8526>.
And from thence he went <WH3212> <WH8799> against the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Debir <WH1688>: and the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> before <WH6440> was Kirjathsepher <WH7158>:

And Kalev <WH3612> said <WH559> <WH8799>, He that smiteth <WH5221> <WH8686> Kirjathsepher <WH7158>, and taketh <WH3920> <WH8804> it, to him will I give <WH5414> <WH8804> Achsah <WH5915> my daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And `Otni'el <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz <WH7073>, Kalev's <WH3612> younger <WH6996> brother <WH251>, took <WH3920> <WH8799> it: and he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him Achsah <WH5915> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802>.

And it came to pass, when she came <WH935> <WH8800> to him, that she moved <WH5496> <WH8686> him to ask <WH7592> <WH8800> of her father <WH1> a field <WH7704>: and she lighted <WH6795> <WH8799> from off her ass <WH2543>; and Kalev <WH3612> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, What wilt thou?

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Give <WH3051> <WH8798> me a b'rakhah <WH1293>: for thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> me a south <WH5045> land <WH776>; give <WH5414> <WH8804> me also springs <WH1543> of water <WH4325>. And Kalev <WH3612> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the nether <WH8482> springs <WH1543>.

And the children <WH1121> of the Kenite <WH7017>, Mosheh <WH4872> ' father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802>, went up <WH5927> <WH8804> out of the city <WH5892> of palm trees <WH8558> <WH8677> <WH5899> with the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, which lieth in the south <WH5045> of Arad <WH6166>; and they went <WH3212> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH854> the people <WH5971>.

And Y'hudah <WH3063> went <WH3212> <WH8799> with SHim`on <WH8095> his brother <WH251>, and they slew <WH5221> <WH8686> the Kanahanites <WH3669> that inhabited <WH3427> <WH8802> Zephath <WH6857>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> it. And the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> <WH8799> Hormah <WH2767>.
Also Y'hudah <WH3063> took <WH3920> <WH8799> Gaza <WH5804> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Askelon <WH831> with the coast <WH1366> thereof, and Ekron <WH6138> with the coast <WH1366> thereof.

And the YY <WH3068> was with Y'hudah <WH3063>; and he drave out <WH3423> <WH8686> the inhabitants of the mountain <WH2022>; but could not <WH3808> drive out <WH3423> <WH8687> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the valley <WH6010>, because they had chariots <WH7393> of iron <WH1270>.

And they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> Hevron <WH2275> unto Kalev <WH3612>, as Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH1696> <WH8765>: and he expelled <WH3423> <WH8686> thence the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>.

And the children <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144> did not drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the Y'vusis <WH2983> that inhabited <WH3427> <WH8802> Yerushalayim <WH3389>; but the Y'vusis <WH2983> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> with the children <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144> in Yerushalayim <WH3389> unto this day <WH3117>.
And the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130>, they also went up <WH5927> <WH8799> against Beit-El <WH1008>: and the YY <WH3068> was with them.
And the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130> sent to descry <WH8446> <WH8686> Beit-El <WH1008>. (Now the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> before <WH6440> was Luz <WH3870>.)

And the spies <WH8104> <WH8802> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> a man <WH376> come forth <WH3318> <WH8802> out of the city <WH5892>, and they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Shew <WH7200> <WH8685> us, we pray thee, the entrance <WH3996> into the city <WH5892>, and we will shew <WH6213> <WH8804> thee mercy <WH2617>.

And when he shewed <WH7200> <WH8686> them the entrance <WH3996> into the city <WH5892>, they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the city <WH5892> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; but they let go <WH7971> <WH8765> the man <WH376> and all his family <WH4940>.

And the man <WH376> went <WH3212> <WH8799> into the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850>, and built <WH1129> <WH8799> a city <WH5892>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> thereof Luz <WH3870>: which is the name <WH8034> thereof unto this day <WH3117>.

Neither did M'nasheh <WH4519> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the inhabitants of Bethshean <WH1052> and her towns <WH1323>, nor Taanach <WH8590> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Dor <WH1756> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Ibleam <WH2991> and her towns <WH1323>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns <WH1323>: but the Kanahanites <WH3669> would <WH2974> <WH8686> dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in that land <WH776>.

And it came to pass, when Yisra'EL <WH3478> was strong <WH2388> <WH8804>, that they put <WH7760> <WH8799> the Kanahanites <WH3669> to tribute <WH4522>, and did not utterly <WH3423> <WH8687> drive them out <WH3423> <WH8689>.

Neither did Efrayim <WH669> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the Kanahanites <WH3669> that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in Gezer <WH1507>; but the Kanahanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in Gezer <WH1507> among <WH7130> them.

Neither did Z'vulun <WH2074> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Kitron <WH7003>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Nahalol <WH5096>; but the Kanahanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH7130> them, and became tributaries <WH4522>.

Neither did Asher <WH836> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Accho <WH5910>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Zidon <WH6721>, nor of Ahlab <WH303>, nor of Achzib <WH392>, nor of Helbah <WH2462>, nor of Aphik <WH663>, nor of Rehob <WH7340>:
But the Asherites <WH843> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH7130> the Kanahanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>: for they did not drive them out <WH3423> <WH8689>.

Neither did Naftali <WH5321> drive out <WH3423> <WH8689> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Bethshemesh <WH1053>, nor the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Bethanath <WH1043>; but he dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> among <WH7130> the Kanahanites <WH3669>, the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>: nevertheless the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Bethshemesh <WH1053> and of Bethanath <WH1043> became tributaries <WH4522> unto them.

And the Amorites <WH567> forced <WH3905> <WH8799> the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> into the mountain <WH2022>: for they would not suffer <WH5414> <WH8804> them to come down <WH3381> <WH8800> to the valley <WH6010>:

But the Amorites <WH567> would <WH2974> <WH8686> dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in mount <WH2022> Heres <WH2776> in Aijalon <WH357>, and in Shaalbim <WH8169>: yet the hand <WH3027> of the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130> prevailed <WH3513> <WH8799>, so that they became tributaries <WH4522>.
And the coast <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567> was from the going up <WH4608> to Akrabbim <WH4610>, from the rock <WH5553>, and upward <WH4605>.
